org.cripac.isee.vpe.util.tracking

Class DirectoryHierarchy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cripac.isee.vpe.util.tracking.DirectoryHierarchy

  • public class DirectoryHierarchy
extends java.lang.Object
    The class DirectoryHierarchy is used to store the hierarchy of a directory as well as the files the directory directly contains.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DirectoryHierarchy(java.lang.String name, DirectoryHierarchy parent)
      Create a hierarchy given NAME and parent hierarchy.

      Add into this group all the files in the folder whose NAME matches a regex.

      Create a top hierarchy.
